title: Can't Reconnect
body: When the countdown is over in Client, the game never pops-up and then it asks me to reconnect.  The problem is when I press the button nothing happens .

replies.body: Hey there, this error is usually caused by security settings that's blocking game files from being accessed or launching.  Double check security settings and firewalls to make sure League is added as an exception, the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide can help with that.  Test it in a custom game, though!
http://i63.tinypic.com/28m977.png[/IMG] keep getting failed to patch after I have re-downloaded the client
